title: 9 Beauty Brand Spas in Hong Kong—and the Treatments to Try
author: Rachel Read; Helen Yu
description: These are the best luxury beauty brand spas to visit in Hong Kong.
cleaned_text: Treat yourself to a day of relaxation and pure bliss at these luxury beauty brand spas Whilst we all have our favourite beauty brands that we love using, sometimes we want a little more pampering than just applying a [sheet mask](https://hk.asiatatler.com/style/face-sheet-masks-sensitive-skin) at home. If you're craving an extra dose of indulgence, we've rounded up nine luxury beauty brands with their own [spas](https://hk.asiatatler.com/life/best-hotel-spas-hong-kong-spa-treatments) in Hong Kong—and we're talking dedicated treatment spaces rather than cramped rooms hidden in department stores—along with their must-try treatments to experience. Don't Miss: [The Best Hotel Spas In Hong Kong—Plus Top Spa Treatments To Try](https://hk.asiatatler.com/life/best-hotel-spas-hong-kong-spa-treatments) 1. La Prairie Spa treatments don't get more than [La Prairie](https://www.tatlerasia.com/style/beauty/la-prairie-skin-caviar)'s offerings at its brand residence in [H Queen's](https://www.tatlerasia.com/style/beauty/la-prairie-house-hong-kong-h-queens). From the modern gallery-style installation in the foyer, to the plush interiors and floor-to-ceiling that allow natural light to flood the space, everything here exudes elegance and is meant to reflect the brand's legacy, offering guests a truly luxurious setting for a top-notch beauty experience. The facials they offer are all exclusive and only available to VVIPs and selected guests upon invitation. Carried out by La Prairie's experienced in-house therapists at a calming, tastefully designed treatment room, the four signature facials are designed to restore the skin's natural healthy glow, each of which features luxury products from the brand's collections, including Skin Caviar, White Caviar, Platinum Rare and Radiance.
